author.name: Ashsih Rijal
author.about: I am motivated and results-oriented software engineer with over a decade of experience building robust, scalable, and efficient solutions across diverse industries.  I've consistently delivered impactful results in areas ranging from e-commerce and logistics to education, retail management, healthcare, and finance.  My technical expertise is complemented by strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication, and a collaborative approach.  As a proven team lead and senior engineer, I have a track record of successfully guiding development teams to deliver high-quality projects on time and within budget.
author.background: I'm a highly experienced software engineer and team lead with a proven track record of delivering successful projects across diverse industries.  My background includes developing robust and scalable solutions for restaurant management, freight forwarding, and multi-store retail systems.  As a Senior Software Engineer Team Lead, I've honed my leadership skills, coordinating cross-functional teams, implementing Agile/Scrum methodologies, and architecting effective system designs.  I'm proficient in a wide range of technologies, including .NET 6, React, Next.js, React Native, Angular, and C#, allowing me to adapt to various project requirements.  My expertise spans the full software development lifecycle, from design patterns and architecture to front-end and back-end development, enabling me to solve complex technical challenges and drive impactful results.
strengths: Experience with ASP.NET MVC,React, Angular,Unity, React Native, and WPF
Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions on time
